trans-unit.source: Directs tracing or debugging output as XML-encoded data to a <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> or to a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />, such as a <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" />.
trans-unit.target: 將追蹤或偵錯輸出做為 XML 編碼資料導向 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />，例如做為 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" />。

trans-unit.source: You must have unmanaged code permission to create an instance of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener> class.
trans-unit.target: 您必須具備 unmanaged 程式碼權限建立的執行個體<xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener> class converts tracing and debugging information into an XML-encoded text stream.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener>類別會追蹤和偵錯資訊的 XML 編碼的文字資料流轉換成。

trans-unit.source: The description of the XML output is shown in the tables that follow.
trans-unit.target: 描述的 XML 輸出所示的資料表。

trans-unit.source: You can use the [Service Trace Viewer Tool (SvcTraceViewer.exe)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=240129) to display the XML output.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用[服務追蹤檢視器工具 (SvcTraceViewer.exe)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=240129)以顯示 XML 輸出。

trans-unit.source: You can enable or disable an <xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener> through the application configuration file and then use the configured <xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener> in your application.
trans-unit.target: 您可以啟用或停用<xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener>透過應用程式組態檔，然後使用已設定的<xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener>應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: Alternately, you can create an <xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener> in your code.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以建立<xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener>程式碼中。

trans-unit.source: To configure an <xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener>, edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定<xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener>，編輯組態檔對應到您的應用程式的名稱。

trans-unit.source: In this file, you can add or remove a listener, set the properties for a listener, or remove listeners.
trans-unit.target: 在此檔案中，可以新增或移除接聽程式、 設定接聽程式的屬性或移除接聽程式。

trans-unit.source: The configuration file should be formatted like the following example.
trans-unit.target: 組態檔應該格式如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener> class inherits the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.Filter%2A> property from the base class <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener>類別會繼承<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.Filter%2A>從基底類別屬性<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.Filter%2A> property allows an additional level of trace output filtering at the listener.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.Filter%2A>屬性可讓一層額外的接聽程式在篩選的追蹤輸出。

trans-unit.source: If there is a filter present, the `Trace` methods of the trace listener call the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceFilter.ShouldTrace%2A> method of the filter to determine whether to emit the trace.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有出現，篩選`Trace`追蹤接聽程式呼叫的方法<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceFilter.ShouldTrace%2A>方法來判斷是否要發出的追蹤篩選器。

trans-unit.source: If an attempt is made to write to a file that is in use or unavailable, the file name is automatically prefixed by a GUID.
trans-unit.target: 如果嘗試寫入正在使用中的檔案，或無法使用，檔案名稱自動加上為 GUID。

trans-unit.source: Listener methods are intended to be called by methods of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace>, and <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource> classes.
trans-unit.target: 接聽程式方法的目的是要呼叫的方法來<xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug>， <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace>，和<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource>類別。

trans-unit.source: The listener methods are not intended to be called directly from application code.
trans-unit.target: 接聽程式方法的目的不是直接從應用程式程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener> listener is primarily intended for use by the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener>接聽程式主要是供<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener.Write%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener.WriteLine%2A> methods can be called by the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug> classes, and default values are provided for the XML elements that <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug> do not supply values for.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener.Write%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener.WriteLine%2A>方法可以呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug>類別，以及預設值，可供 XML 項目，<xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug>不提供的值。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the elements and attributes of the XML output.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述的元素和屬性的 XML 輸出。

trans-unit.source: Element
trans-unit.target: 元素

trans-unit.source: Attributes
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Output
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: Notes
trans-unit.target: 注意

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Depends on the presence of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceOptions.Callstack> flag in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.TraceOutputOptions%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 取決於是否存在<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceOptions.Callstack>加上旗標<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.TraceOutputOptions%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Special characters such as > or < are replaced with escape sequences.
trans-unit.target: 特殊字元，例如 > 或 < 逸出序列所取代。

trans-unit.source: See the escaped character translation table that follows.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱逸出的字元轉譯表格所示。

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Always present.
trans-unit.target: 永遠存在。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Environment.MachineName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Environment.MachineName%2A> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Always present
trans-unit.target: 永遠存在

trans-unit.source: If not specified, the default is an empty GUID.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定，預設值是空的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: Depends on the presence of the `relatedActivityId` parameter in the Trace method call.
trans-unit.target: 取決於是否存在`relatedActivityId`追蹤方法呼叫中的參數。

trans-unit.source: The `relatedActivityId` parameter of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener.TraceTransfer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener.TraceTransfer%2A> 方法的 `relatedActivityId` 參數。

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Depends on the `data` parameter of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener.TraceData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 取決於`data`參數<xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener.TraceData%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This element can contain an array of elements or one element, so the values are written as a set of `DataItem` nodes under the `TraceData` element.
trans-unit.target: 這個項目可以包含在陣列的項目或一個項目，因此此值會寫入為一組`DataItem`下的節點`TraceData`項目。

trans-unit.source: The data output uses the `ToString` method of the passed-in data objects.
trans-unit.target: 資料輸出使用`ToString`傳入的資料物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Always present.
trans-unit.target: 永遠存在。

trans-unit.source: Parameter input (`id`).
trans-unit.target: 參數的輸入 (`id`)。

trans-unit.source: Always present.
trans-unit.target: 永遠存在。

trans-unit.source: From the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache>.
trans-unit.target: 從<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache>。

trans-unit.source: Always present.
trans-unit.target: 永遠存在。

trans-unit.source: From the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache>.
trans-unit.target: 從<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache>。

trans-unit.source: On Windows 98 and Windows Me operating systems, if `ProcessID` is greater than 2,147,483,647 it is a positive representation of a negative number and should be converted to obtain the correct process identifier.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows 98 和 Windows Me 作業系統較高，如果`ProcessID`大於的 2147483647，它是負數值的正數表示法，並應該轉換成取得正確的處理序識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Always present.
trans-unit.target: 永遠存在。

trans-unit.source: From the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache>.
trans-unit.target: 從<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache>。

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Always present.
trans-unit.target: 永遠存在。

trans-unit.source: Parameter input (the numeric value of `eventType`).
trans-unit.target: 參數的輸入 (數值`eventType`)。

trans-unit.source: Parameter values greater than 255 are output as 255.
trans-unit.target: 大於 255 的參數值會輸出為 255。

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Depends on the presence of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceOptions.LogicalOperationStack> flag in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.TraceOutputOptions%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 取決於是否存在<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceOptions.LogicalOperationStack>加上旗標<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.TraceOutputOptions%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: There can be more than one logical operation, so the values are written as `LogicalOperation` nodes under the `LogicalOperationStack` element.
trans-unit.target: 可能有一個以上的邏輯作業，讓這些值會寫為`LogicalOperation`下的節點`LogicalOperationStack`項目。

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Depends on the presence of a message in the Trace method call.
trans-unit.target: 取決於存在的追蹤方法呼叫中的訊息。

trans-unit.source: This element is a formatted message if formatting arguments are provided.
trans-unit.target: 如果格式化的引數提供，此元素為格式化的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Always present.
trans-unit.target: 永遠存在。

trans-unit.source: Parameter input.
trans-unit.target: 輸入的參數。

trans-unit.source: Always present.
trans-unit.target: 永遠存在。

trans-unit.source: Parameter input.
trans-unit.target: 輸入的參數。

trans-unit.source: Always present.
trans-unit.target: 永遠存在。

trans-unit.source: If not present in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache>, the default is the current time.
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在於<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache>，預設值是目前的時間。

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Depends on the presence of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceOptions.Timestamp> flag in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.TraceOutputOptions%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 取決於是否存在<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceOptions.Timestamp>加上旗標<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.TraceOutputOptions%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: From the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache>.
trans-unit.target: 從<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache>。

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Always present.
trans-unit.target: 永遠存在。

trans-unit.source: Always the value 3.
trans-unit.target: 永遠值 3。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the characters that are escaped in the XML output.
trans-unit.target: 下表會顯示 XML 輸出中逸出字元。

trans-unit.source: Escaping occurs in all the elements and attributes with the exception of the `DataItem` element, which is not escaped if the object passed to the `data` parameter of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener.TraceData%2A> method is an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object.
trans-unit.target: 逸出發生的所有項目和屬性除了`DataItem`項目，如果物件傳遞至未逸出`data`參數<xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener.TraceData%2A>方法<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>物件。

trans-unit.source: If an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is used for the data object, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToRoot%2A> method is called and the entire root node is traced as unescaped data.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>資料物件，用於<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToRoot%2A>方法呼叫，而且整個根節點會以未逸出的資料進行追蹤。

trans-unit.source: Escaped character
trans-unit.target: 逸出的字元

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: 0xD
trans-unit.target: 0xD

trans-unit.source: 0xA
trans-unit.target: 0xA

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener> class to write both escaped and non-escaped data to file logs.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener>類別將逸出和非逸出的資料寫入至檔案記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: for the ability to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 提供呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的能力。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> that represents the stream the trace listener writes to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />，表示追蹤接聽程式所寫入的資料流。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener" /> class, using the specified stream as the recipient of the debugging and tracing output.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的資料流做為偵錯和追蹤輸出的接收者，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.Name%2A> property is initialized to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.Name%2A>屬性會初始化為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="stream" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="stream" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: for the ability to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 提供呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的能力。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> that receives the output from the trace listener.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />，從追蹤接聽程式接收輸出。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener" /> class using the specified writer as the recipient of the debugging and tracing output.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的寫入器做為偵錯和追蹤輸出的接收者，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.Name%2A> property is initialized to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.Name%2A>屬性會初始化為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="writer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="writer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: for the ability to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 提供呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的能力。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the file to write to.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener" /> class, using the specified file as the recipient of the debugging and tracing output.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的檔案做為偵錯和追蹤輸出的接收者，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.IO.StreamWriter> class for the specified file on the specified path, using <xref:System.Text.Encoding.UTF8%2A> encoding.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.IO.StreamWriter>類別上指定的路徑、 指定的檔案使用<xref:System.Text.Encoding.UTF8%2A>編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: If the file exists, it is appended to.
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案存在，就會附加至。

trans-unit.source: If the file does not exist, a new file is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案不存在，則會建立新的檔案。

trans-unit.source: To reduce the chance of an exception, any character that might invalidate the output is replaced with a "?" character.
trans-unit.target: 若要減少發生例外狀況的機會，可能會讓輸出的任何字元會取代"？"字元。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.Name%2A> property is initialized to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.Name%2A>屬性會初始化為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="filename" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="filename" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: for the ability to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 提供呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的能力。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> that represents the stream the trace listener writes to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />，表示追蹤接聽程式所寫入的資料流。

trans-unit.source: The name of the new instance.
trans-unit.target: 新執行個體的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener" /> class with the specified name, using the specified stream as the recipient of the debugging and tracing output.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的資料流做為偵錯和追蹤輸出的接收者，以指定的名稱初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.Name%2A> property to the `name` parameter value or to an empty string ("") if the `name` parameter is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式初始化<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.Name%2A>屬性`name`參數值或空字串 ("") 如果`name`參數是`null`。

trans-unit.source: The name can be used as an index into the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection to programmatically change the properties for the listener.
trans-unit.target: 此名稱可以當做索引<xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>要以程式設計方式變更接聽程式的屬性集合。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following code sets the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.TraceOutputOptions%2A> property for an instance of <xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener> whose <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.Name%2A> property is "xmlListener".
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列程式碼設定<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.TraceOutputOptions%2A>的執行個體屬性<xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener>其<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.Name%2A>屬性是 「 xmlListener"。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="stream" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="stream" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: for the ability to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 提供呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的能力。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> that receives the output from the trace listener.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />，從追蹤接聽程式接收輸出。

trans-unit.source: The name of the new instance.
trans-unit.target: 新執行個體的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener" /> class with the specified name, using the specified writer as the recipient of the debugging and tracing output.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的寫入器做為偵錯和追蹤輸出的接收者，以指定的名稱初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.Name%2A> property to the `name` parameter value or to an empty string ("") if the `name` parameter is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式初始化<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.Name%2A>屬性`name`參數值或空字串 ("") 如果`name`參數是`null`。

trans-unit.source: The name can be used as an index into the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection to programmatically change the properties for the listener.
trans-unit.target: 此名稱可以當做索引<xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>要以程式設計方式變更接聽程式的屬性集合。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following code sets the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.TraceOutputOptions%2A> property for an instance of <xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener> whose <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.Name%2A> property is "xmlListener".
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列程式碼設定<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.TraceOutputOptions%2A>的執行個體屬性<xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener>其<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.Name%2A>屬性是 「 xmlListener"。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="writer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="writer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: for the ability to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 提供呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的能力。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the file to write to.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the new instance.
trans-unit.target: 新執行個體的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener" /> class with the specified name, using the specified file as the recipient of the debugging and tracing output.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的檔案做為偵錯和追蹤輸出的接收者，以指定的名稱初始化 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.IO.StreamWriter> class for the specified file on the specified path, using <xref:System.Text.Encoding.UTF8%2A> encoding.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.IO.StreamWriter>類別上指定的路徑、 指定的檔案使用<xref:System.Text.Encoding.UTF8%2A>編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: If the file exists, it is appended to.
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案存在，就會附加至。

trans-unit.source: If the file does not exist, a new file is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果檔案不存在，則會建立新的檔案。

trans-unit.source: To reduce the chance of an exception, any character that might invalidate the output is replaced with a "?" character.
trans-unit.target: 若要減少發生例外狀況的機會，可能會讓輸出的任何字元會取代"？"字元。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.Name%2A> property is set to the `name` parameter value or to an empty string ("") if the `name` parameter is `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.Name%2A>屬性設定為`name`參數值或空字串 ("") 如果`name`參數是`null`。

trans-unit.source: The name can be used as an index into the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection to programmatically change the properties for the listener.
trans-unit.target: 此名稱可以當做索引<xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>要以程式設計方式變更接聽程式的屬性集合。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following code sets the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.TraceOutputOptions%2A> property for an instance of <xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener> whose <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.Name%2A> property is "xmlListener".
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列程式碼設定<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.TraceOutputOptions%2A>的執行個體屬性<xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener>其<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.Name%2A>屬性是 「 xmlListener"。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="stream" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="stream" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: for the ability to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 提供呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的能力。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode" />。

trans-unit.source: Closes the <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.TextWriterTraceListener.Writer" /> for this listener so that it no longer receives tracing or debugging output.
trans-unit.target: 關閉這個接聽程式的 <see cref="P:System.Diagnostics.TextWriterTraceListener.Writer" />，使其不再接收追蹤或偵錯輸出。

trans-unit.source: The error message to write.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The detailed error message to append to the error message.
trans-unit.target: 要附加至錯誤訊息的詳細錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Writes trace information including an error message and a detailed error message to the file or stream.
trans-unit.target: 寫入包括錯誤訊息的追蹤資訊，以及詳細的錯誤訊息至檔案或資料流。

trans-unit.source: The default behavior is to display the message and detailed message in a message box when the application is running in user-interface mode, and to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener> instances in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection.
trans-unit.target: 預設行為是以訊息以及詳細的訊息顯示在訊息方塊中，在使用者介面模式中，以及執行應用程式時<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener>中執行個體<xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>集合。

trans-unit.source: By default, the collection contains an instance of <xref:System.Diagnostics.DefaultTraceListener>.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，集合包含的執行個體<xref:System.Diagnostics.DefaultTraceListener>。

trans-unit.source: You can customize this behavior by adding or removing a <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener> from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以自訂此行為，透過加入或移除<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener>從集合。

trans-unit.source: for the ability to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 提供呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的能力。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode" />。

trans-unit.source: Writes trace data to the output file or stream.
trans-unit.target: 將追蹤資料寫入輸出檔或資料流。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache" /> that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache" />，包含目前處理序 ID、執行緒 ID 和堆疊追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: The source name.
trans-unit.target: 來源名稱。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: A numeric identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的數值識別項。

trans-unit.source: A data object to emit.
trans-unit.target: 要發出的資料物件。

trans-unit.source: Writes trace information, a data object, and event information to the file or stream.
trans-unit.target: 寫入追蹤資訊，及事件資訊至檔案或資料流。

trans-unit.source: The `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace.
trans-unit.target: `eventCache`， `source`， `eventType`，和`id`頁首及頁尾的追蹤中使用參數。

trans-unit.source: The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before writing, so a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer.
trans-unit.target: `id`參數就會轉換成不帶正負號的整數之前寫入，因此負數`id`值會寫為大型的正整數。

trans-unit.source: The `data` parameter is written as a `DataItem` node in the `TraceData` element.
trans-unit.target: `data`參數會撰寫成`DataItem`節點`TraceData`項目。

trans-unit.source: The `ToString` method of the data object is used to convert the object to a string.
trans-unit.target: `ToString`資料物件的方法用來將物件轉換成字串。

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be called directly by application code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不是直接由應用程式程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: It is called by methods of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace>, and <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource> classes to write trace data.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫此方法的方法<xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug>， <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace>，和<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource>類別來寫入追蹤資料。

trans-unit.source: for the ability to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 提供呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的能力。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache" /> that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache" />，包含目前處理序 ID、執行緒 ID 和堆疊追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: The source name.
trans-unit.target: 來源名稱。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: A numeric identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的數值識別項。

trans-unit.source: An array of data objects to emit.
trans-unit.target: 要發出的資料物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: Writes trace information, data objects, and event information to the file or stream.
trans-unit.target: 寫入追蹤資訊、資料物件，以及事件資訊至檔案或資料流。

trans-unit.source: The `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace.
trans-unit.target: `eventCache`， `source`， `eventType`，和`id`頁首及頁尾的追蹤中使用參數。

trans-unit.source: The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before writing, so a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer.
trans-unit.target: `id`參數就會轉換成不帶正負號的整數之前寫入，因此負數`id`值會寫為大型的正整數。

trans-unit.source: The objects in the `data` parameter array are written as `DataItem` nodes in the `TraceData` element.
trans-unit.target: 中的物件`data`參數陣列會寫入為`DataItem`中的節點`TraceData`項目。

trans-unit.source: The `ToString` method of each data object is used to convert the object to a string.
trans-unit.target: `ToString`的每個資料物件的方法用來將物件轉換成字串。

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be called directly by application code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不是直接由應用程式程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: It is called by methods of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace>, and <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource> classes to write trace data.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫此方法的方法<xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug>， <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace>，和<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource>類別來寫入追蹤資料。

trans-unit.source: for the ability to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 提供呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的能力。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode" />。

trans-unit.source: Writes event trace information to the output file or stream.
trans-unit.target: 將事件追蹤資訊寫入輸出檔或資料流。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache" /> that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache" />，包含目前處理序 ID、執行緒 ID 和堆疊追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: The source name.
trans-unit.target: 來源名稱。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: A numeric identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的數值識別項。

trans-unit.source: The message to write.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Writes trace information, a message, and event information to the file or stream.
trans-unit.target: 寫入追蹤資訊、訊息，以及事件資訊至檔案或資料流。

trans-unit.source: The `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace.
trans-unit.target: `eventCache`， `source`， `eventType`，和`id`頁首及頁尾的追蹤中使用參數。

trans-unit.source: The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before writing, so a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer.
trans-unit.target: `id`參數就會轉換成不帶正負號的整數之前寫入，因此負數`id`值會寫為大型的正整數。

trans-unit.source: The `message` parameter is written as the `Message` element.
trans-unit.target: `message`參數會撰寫成`Message`項目。

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be called directly by application code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不是直接由應用程式程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: It is called by methods of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace>, and <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource> classes to write trace data.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫此方法的方法<xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug>， <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace>，和<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource>類別來寫入追蹤資料。

trans-unit.source: for the ability to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 提供呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的能力。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache" /> that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache" />，包含目前處理序 ID、執行緒 ID 和堆疊追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: The source name.
trans-unit.target: 來源名稱。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: A numeric identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的數值識別項。

trans-unit.source: A format string that contains zero or more format items that correspond to objects in the <c>args</c> array.
trans-unit.target: 包含零或多個格式項目的格式字串，這些項目與 <c>args</c> 陣列中的物件相對應。

trans-unit.source: An object array containing zero or more objects to format.
trans-unit.target: 物件陣列，包含零個或多個要格式化的物件。

trans-unit.source: Writes trace information, a formatted message, and event information to the file or stream.
trans-unit.target: 寫入追蹤資訊、格式化訊息，以及事件資訊至檔案或資料流。

trans-unit.source: The `eventCache`, `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace.
trans-unit.target: `eventCache`， `source`， `eventType`，和`id`頁首及頁尾的追蹤中使用參數。

trans-unit.source: The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before writing, so a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer.
trans-unit.target: `id`參數就會轉換成不帶正負號的整數之前寫入，因此負數`id`值會寫為大型的正整數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String.Format%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%5B%5D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is called, passing in the `format` string and `args` array as parameters, to format the `args` object array as the `Message` element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String.Format%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%5B%5D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>呼叫方法時，傳入`format`字串和`args`陣列做為參數，來格式化`args`物件陣列做為`Message`項目。

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be called directly by application code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不是直接由應用程式程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: It is called by methods of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace>, and <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource> classes to write trace data.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫此方法的方法<xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug>， <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace>，和<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource>類別來寫入追蹤資料。

trans-unit.source: for the ability to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 提供呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的能力。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache" /> that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache" />，包含目前處理序 ID、執行緒 ID 和堆疊追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: The source name.
trans-unit.target: 來源名稱。

trans-unit.source: A numeric identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的數值識別項。

trans-unit.source: A trace message to write.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入的追蹤訊息。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> structure that identifies a related activity.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> 結構，辨識相關活動。

trans-unit.source: Writes trace information including the identity of a related activity, a message, and event information to the file or stream.
trans-unit.target: 寫入包含相關活動之識別的追蹤資訊、訊息，以及事件資訊至檔案或資料流。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener.TraceTransfer%2A> method is used for the correlation of related traces.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener.TraceTransfer%2A>方法用於的相關的追蹤相互關聯。

trans-unit.source: The `eventCache`, `source`, `id`, and `relatedActivityId` parameters are used in the header and footer of the trace.
trans-unit.target: `eventCache`， `source`， `id`，和`relatedActivityId`頁首及頁尾的追蹤中使用參數。

trans-unit.source: The `id` parameter is converted to an unsigned integer before writing, so a negative `id` value is written as a large positive integer.
trans-unit.target: `id`參數就會轉換成不帶正負號的整數之前寫入，因此負數`id`值會寫為大型的正整數。

trans-unit.source: The `message` parameter is written as the `Message` element.
trans-unit.target: `message`參數會撰寫成`Message`項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid.ToString%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is called to convert the `relatedActivityId`value to a "B" formatted string, which appears in the header.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Guid.ToString%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法呼叫以將轉換`relatedActivityId`"B"的值格式化字串，它會出現在標頭。

trans-unit.source: The `SubTypeName` element in the footer identifies the trace event type as a <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Transfer>.
trans-unit.target: `SubTypeName`在頁尾中的項目會識別為追蹤事件類型<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType.Transfer>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener.TraceTransfer%2A> method is not intended to be called by application code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener.TraceTransfer%2A>方法不是由應用程式程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: It is intended to be called by a <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource> object to emit the trace information for its <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource.TraceTransfer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 它是由呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource>發出的追蹤資訊的物件及其<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource.TraceTransfer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: for the ability to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 提供呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的能力。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode" />。

trans-unit.source: The message to write.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Writes a verbatim message without any additional context information to the file or stream.
trans-unit.target: 寫入逐字規範訊息至檔案或資料流，不加任何其他內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener.TraceData%2A> method to include context information in the log output.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener.TraceData%2A>方法，將記錄輸出中包含的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: for the ability to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 提供呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的能力。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode" />。

trans-unit.source: The message to write.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Writes a verbatim message without any additional context information followed by the current line terminator to the file or stream.
trans-unit.target: 寫入逐字規範訊息至檔案或資料流，不加任何其他內容資訊，後面附上目前的行結束字元。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener.TraceData%2A> method to include context information in the log output.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.XmlWriterTraceListener.TraceData%2A>方法，將記錄輸出中包含的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: for the ability to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 提供呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的能力。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="P:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionAttribute.UnmanagedCode" />。
